name: Music_2451.wav
keywords: ['hindi', 'bansuri flute', 'male voices singing', 'kids voice singing', 'tablas', 'string instrument', 'slower to medium tempo', 'energetic meditative']
caption: This audio contains a lot of percussion such as tablas playing a rhythm along with shakers and more. Male voices are singing something like a mantra repeating the same melody. Kids' voices are also singing the same melody in a higher octave. A bansuri flute adds little melody lines. This song may be playing during a ceremony.
